response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, we propose to offer this product to you for $950,000. We are confident that this price reflects the true worth of the product and provides an opportunity for both of us to benefit. Should you decide to proceed, we assure you of our commitment to providing excellent service and support throughout the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
